properties.title: Lioson lake
properties.abstract: Lake Lioson is a jewel of nature to be discovered. It is also called «Pearl of the Alpine Lakes» because of its emerald colour created by the surrounding mountains reflected in the water.
properties.description: Lake Lioson offers a marvellous hiking destination on one’s own, for families, or for groups. It is located in the Pic Chaussy massif at 1,890 metres. The lake is greatly appreciated by fishermen as it abounds in fish, and by divers who can discover winter diving under the ice in a beautiful setting.
properties.name: Office du Tourisme des Mosses
